params.name: do_crop_margin
params.description: Whether to crop the image margins.

params.name: do_resize
params.description: Whether to resize the images (height, width) dimensions to the specified size. Can be overridden bydo_resize in the preprocess method.

params.name: size
params.type: Dict[str, int] optional, defaults to {"height" -- 896, "width": 672}):Size of the image after resizing. Can be overridden by size in the preprocess method.

params.name: resample
params.description: Resampling filter to use if resizing the image. Can be overridden by resample in the preprocess method.

params.name: do_thumbnail
params.description: Whether to resize the image using thumbnail method.

params.name: do_align_long_axis
params.description: Whether to align the long axis of the image with the long axis of size by rotating by 90 degrees.

params.name: do_pad
params.description: Whether to pad the images to the largest image size in the batch.

params.name: do_rescale
params.description: Whether to rescale the image by the specified scale rescale_factor. Can be overridden by the do_rescaleparameter in the preprocess method.

params.name: rescale_factor
params.description: Scale factor to use if rescaling the image. Can be overridden by the rescale_factor parameter in thepreprocess method.

params.name: do_normalize
params.description: Whether to normalize the image. Can be overridden by do_normalize in the preprocess method.

params.name: image_mean
params.description: Mean to use if normalizing the image. This is a float or list of floats the length of the number ofchannels in the image. Can be overridden by the image_mean parameter in the preprocess method.
